data: The floor beneath me, slanting swiftly downward, flung me across the room and against its metal wall as our whole ship suddenly spun crazily in mid-space.
Hamilton, Edmond, 1904-1977; Senf, C. C. (Curtis Charles), 1873-1949 [Illustrator]
